page.title: 07Liverpool Newsham,Transport
page.content: The volume of traffic in several places was nearly 2000 per hour. A survey of transport showed that 60% of people used public transport to travel to work,30% used cars and 10% walked. Most people were pleased with the frequency of services.Edge Hill railway station contains a major depot for rolling stock and important trans-pennine routes and local ones pass through the area.Green Lane bus depot operates 17 services and 111 buses are based there.It is the North Divisional HQ for Merseyside Passenger Authority. 3 major roads transverse our block West Derby Road,Prescot Road and Edge Lane carrying traffic to the Liverpool Ring Road,Queens Drive linking with the national motorways system via the M62.
